docs.text:
Welcome


Hello and welcome to my personal portfolio. My name is Roman Larionov and I am currently a senior, studying computer science, at the University of Central Florida. Throughout this site, you will find several projects that I have worked on in my Intro to Composition 2 course at UCF. Each project contains my initially submitted drafts, a revised version, and a detailed explanation for any revision choices. A overview of my thought process behind every major project can be found in the 
Portfolio Reflection
 section as well.
docs.title: Home
